reviewText: I was not happy with this selection because it was not in English it was in french. I'm not sure how to go about sending this merchandise back to amazon. Please help.
It came in French  even  though  It  said there was English  as well as French
A gift, kids love it, thanks for the fast delivery.....

This is a French speaking DVD. I speak English.  I want to send this back. I have no use for it at all! When I was deciding to purchase it. It clearly stated that it was English.  When I put it into the DVD player, it was totally French dialogue.  Although French is a beautiful language, I can't watch the episodes because I can't understand them.
